p: Chloroform, methanol and petroleum ether were purchased from Lab-Scan analytical Sciences (Poland). Ethanol, diethyl ether and n-hexane were obtained from Scientific Limited (Northampton, UK). 2, 7-Dichlorofluorescein, DPPH (2, 2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl radical) and the standard 1-eicosanol were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich, Co. (St. Louis, MO, USA). Potassium hydroxide pellets and anhydrous sodium sulfate were obtained from AppliChem (Darmstadt, Germany). ABTS, 2,29-azinobis(3-ethylbenzothiazoline-6- sulfonic acid) diammonium salt, and potassium persulfate (di-potassium peroxdisulfate) were obtained from Sigma-Aldrich (Poole, Dorset, UK).
